title: Snow Day Scuttle icon
body: I gifted mystery skin to a friend of mine for the icon but i still haven't received it

replies.body: they said you'd have to wait until the 23rd for it to show
As *I ADCarry* mentioned, we're still getting icons sent out until the end of the month. If you don't have it by then, feel free to hit me back about it. ^.^
Does it apply to gifting rune pages too? :)
So long as you gifted it during the Snowdown Event, yes! :)
Can I get my snow day scuttle icon? I gifted to a friend during the event also
thanks, will do if I don't get the icon
